content.html: Your mommy and daddy give you a lemonade stand. And you buy lemons and sugar and sell lemonade. But next year (you’ll be 6) your table remains but no one has heard of or from you since last year and the only clue is the word Croatoan carved into the wood of your stand
content.value: Your mommy and daddy give you a lemonade stand. And you buy lemons and sugar and sell lemonade. But next year (you’ll be 6) your table remains but no one has heard of or from you since last year and the only clue is the word Croatoan carved into the wood of your stand
